Class HeartbeatMonitor

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.resilience.HeartbeatMonitor
public class HeartbeatMonitor extends Object
Worker Heartbeat Monitor - tracks worker liveness and removes dead workers. Workers must send heartbeats periodically. If no heartbeat is received within the timeout period, the worker is marked as dead and removed.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    HeartbeatMonitor.WorkerInfo
    Worker info tracking last heartbeat and status.

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HeartbeatMonitor()
    Create heartbeat monitor with default settings. - 30 second timeout - 10 second check interval

    Create heartbeat monitor with custom settings.
